project_descr: This programme will focus on reducing risks associated with earthquakes in an urban context in Iran.

outputs.output_descr:
Strengthened Capacities for Disaster Risk Management in Iran through:
- Facilitated access to information for DRM, National Information Portal for DRM and Disaster Inventory (DesInventar). Increased understanding of linkages between development and disaster risk. National Risk Report . Detailed earthquake risk management plans for two selected cities and their hinterlands. Knowledge Network for Disaster Risk Management in Central and South West Asia.

document_name: http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/IRN/00043157/strengthening capacities for disaster risk management in the I.R. Iran.pdf
project_title: strengthening capacities for disaster risk mngt in iran
